name: Arizona Capitol Museum
description: Indoor machine near the gift shop at the museum; 3 designs available.

name: Wildlife World Zoo & Aquarium
description: Two machines at the main entrance gift shop—one with aquarium animals, one with desert animals; total of 8 designs.

name: Williams & Forest Service Visitor Center
description: 4‑design machine in the historic railway‑station visitor center in Williams.

name: Route 66 Museum (Kingman)
description: 4‑design press in the gift shop featuring Route 66 themed designs; includes complimentary pennies.

name: Antelope Canyon Tours, Inc.
description: 4‑design machine inside the gift shop—designs include Antelope Canyon, Horseshoe Bend, Lake Powell, Rainbow Bridge.

name: Grand Canyon Railway RV Park
description: 4‑design hand‑crank machine in foyer of check‑in office/store; historic railroad and Route 66 artwork.

name: Jerome State Historic Park
description: Machine located in the park gift shop in Jerome (may be currently out of order).

name: Flagstaff Visitor Center
description: Pressed‑penny machine at the visitor center on historic Route 66.
